name: Snow Lotus
description: Snow Lotus is a mostly indica cannabis strain bred by Bodhi Seeds. Also known as Goohead, Snow Lotus is parented by an Afgooey female and a  Blockhead male.
attributes_title: Uplifted, Euphoric, Happy, Relaxed, Creative, Stress, Pain, Lack of Appetite, Cramps, Depression, Dizzy, Dry Mouth, Anxious
